jokes.question: To replace programmers with robots, clients will have to accurately describe what they want.
jokes.answer: We are safe!

jokes.question: A guy ordered a pizza with cheese, olives, onion and red pepper. On getting it, the guy shouted - It is not baked.
jokes.answer: Delivery guy - You only get what you ask for.

jokes.question: If somebody refers me for a job
jokes.answer: Will it be considered 'pass by reference' or 'pass by value'?

jokes.question: Once C++ walks into a bar and sees C. C is drunk, falling on the floor, spitting and swearing.
jokes.answer: How classless! -says C++

jokes.question: Are you a RESTful API?
jokes.answer: Because you GET my attention, PUT some love, POST the cutest smile, and DELETE my bad day

jokes.question: I used to know a joke about Java
jokes.answer: But I run out of memory.

jokes.question: Why do Front-End Developers eat lunch alone?
jokes.answer: Because, they don't know how to join tables.

jokes.question: How do you declare war in JavaScript?
jokes.answer: var war;

jokes.question: Knock knock
jokes.answer:
Unsynchronized block
Who's there?

jokes.question: Knock knock. Who's there?
jokes.answer:
Very... long... pause...
Java.

jokes.question: How many types of people are there in the world?
jokes.answer: There are 10 types of people in the world: those who understand binary, and those who don't.

jokes.question: What happens when a UDP package walks into a bar?
jokes.answer: A walks UDP package into bar.

jokes.question: I would tell you a joke about UDP
jokes.answer: But I don't know if you will get it. Either way, I don't care.

jokes.question: What happens when a SQL query goes into a bar?
jokes.answer: It walks up to two tables and asks, 'Can I join you?'

jokes.question: Why does a programmer put two glasses on his bedside table before going to sleep?
jokes.answer: A full one, in case he gets thirsty, and an empty one, in case he doesn't.

jokes.question: How do you style the Leaning Tower of Pisa in CSS?
jokes.answer: pisa-tower { font-style: italic; }

jokes.question: Two bytes meet. The first byte asks, 'Are you ill?'
jokes.answer: The second byte replies, 'No, just feeling a bit off.'

jokes.question: How much US bandwidth is used by Netflix?
jokes.answer: 1/3 of US bandwidth is used by Netflix. The rest is used by `rm -rf node_modules && npm install`

jokes.question: What is debugging?
jokes.answer: Being the detective in a crime movie where you are also the murderer.

jokes.question: What's behind every good program?
jokes.answer: A frustrated programmer.

jokes.question: What's it like being a programmer watching someone HACK a computer on TV?
jokes.answer: It's like being a nurse and watching someone in the movie take blood with a carrot.

jokes.question: Programmer 1: We have a problem!
jokes.answer:
Programmer 2: Let's use RegEx!
Programmer 1: Now we have two problems.

jokes.question: Why did my girlfriend dump me?
jokes.answer: After I named a class after her, she felt I treated her like an object.

jokes.question: What's the programmer's workflow?
jokes.answer: Trying to fix the problem I created when I tried to fix the problems I created when I tried to fix the problems I created when there was a problem

jokes.question: A programmer's wife asks: 'Would you go to the shop and pick up a loaf of bread? And if they have eggs, get a dozen.'
jokes.answer: The programmer returns home with 12 loaves of bread. 'They had eggs.'

jokes.question: What's your address?
jokes.answer:
Developer: 173.168.15.10
Layman: No man. Your local address
Developer: 127.0.0.1
Layman: I mean your physical address
Developer: 29.01.38.62.31.58

jokes.question: Boy: I like you, do you want to be my GF?
jokes.answer:
Girl: ... (30 seconds)
Boy: Why are you quiet?
Girl: ... (30 seconds). '504 Gateway Timeout'

jokes.question: What are pointers in C like?
jokes.answer: I know a guy who knows a guy... who knows another guy

jokes.question: Two strings walk into a bar. What happens?
jokes.answer:
The first string says, 'I think I'll have a beer quag fulk boorg jdk^CjfdLk jk3s d#f67howe%^U r89nvy\~~owmc63^Dz x.xvcu'
The second string says, 'Please excuse my friend, He isn't null-terminated.'

jokes.question: What do the new MacBook and a black hole have in common?
jokes.answer: There's no Escape!

jokes.question: hello
jokes.answer: NEW JOKE
